resources.string: We need GPS satellites enabled in Settings > Location Access.
Send your friend direction to your location! It\'s simple!

It's now very easy to send your location to your firend. 

 Imagine the example - 

 Your friend, Elia, is coming to meet you. You told her to come to a nice little cafe at La Rambla Street. Sadly, she cannot find the place :-( Well, nothing to worry! Just bring out your phone from your pocket, open this app and bam! She gets a detailed google map direction to you! 

 Have a blast!
